page.title: 17Children's Games
page.content:
These are some of the most popular games we play at school.
{Bulldog}- There are two safe homes one at each end. The idea of the game is to get from one end to the other without being touched. One person tries to stop the others from getting across.
{Squash}- One person runs, two people count to twenty and then they run after him or her and when those two people are next to the one person they squash them. Warning: play this game on soft ground only.
{Haunted House}- One person pretends to be a mummy. The other people have to run round a certain thing. If they get touched they become the mummy.
